title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin breaks down game 3 of the NBA Finals and the reason the Warriors have found themselves trailing 2 games to 1 against the Celtics. He points out the one thing the Warriors are missing right now compared to the earlier parts of their dominant run to NBA titles. He talks to NBA Champion Metta Sandiford-Artest about what the Warriors are lacking and what they can do to even up their series against Boston. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
